newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Industries sets split, cash dividend.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Industries sets split, cash dividend.

text.p: U.S. Industries Inc said Thursday that it declared a three-for-two split of its common stock and set a yearly $0.20 per share dividend.
The stock split will be effected in the form of a 50 percent stock dividend to be paid on September 23, 1997 to holders of record of the common stock at the close of business on September 2, 1997.
The company also said it adopted an initial cash dividend policy under which it intends to declare quarterly dividends totaling $0.20 per share a year.
The company declared a $0.05 per share quarterly cash dividend on the shares of U.S. Industries common stock to be issued and outstanding following the stock split.
The cash dividend will be payable October 14 to holders of record of the common stock at the close of business on September 30.
